item.title: Russia and Ukraine exchange drone attacks amid peace talks maneuvers
item.description: Russia and Ukraine exchanged large waves of attack drones overnight into Sunday as the two combatants maneuvered ahead of Friday's planned summit in A...

item.title: 6 wounded, including 5-year-old girl, in Baltimore 'mass shooting': Police
item.description: Police in Baltimore say they are responding to a "mass shooting" in a neighborhood in the northwest part of the city on Saturday night.

item.title: WATCH: Crime scene photos from Idaho college murders released following Kohberger sentencing
item.description: Chilling images of the crime scene in the Idaho college murders are now being made public following the sentencing of convicted killer Bryan Kohberger...

item.title: WATCH: Labubu dolls totaling $7,000 stolen from California store, authorities say
item.description: Police say video shows approximately $7,000 worth of Labubu dolls being stolen from a store in La Puente. The popular stuffed toy costs around $30 eac...

item.title: WATCH: Man convicted in fatal Georgia hit-and-run forgiven by wife of victim
item.description: The remarkable act of forgiveness unfolded in a Georgia courtroom when a woman forgave the man convicted of killing her husband in a hit-and-run.
